Title: Mr. Kaplan (No. 4): Conclusion
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Jon Bokenkamp (teleplay by), John Eisendrath (teleplay by), Daniel Knauf (teleplay by), Lukas Reiter (story by), J.R. Orci (story by)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Plot: Red sets a risky plan in motion to save the Task Force. With the future of the Task Force in jeopardy, Liz confronts the biggest questions about her past.
